pages.message: BecauseOfProg is several developers gathered around common projects, including this blog, since February 2017. Above all, we want to improve ourselves in various fields (development, system administration, computer security...) and share our passions. On this blog, we share our findings, our projects, our point of view.
pages.projectsMessage: BecauseOfProg is a team of developers creating various projects

projects.title: BecauseOfProg's projects
projects.description:
As programming enthusiasts, we use every day open-source software, libraries and services.
As a team gathered by this same passion, we create our own open-source projects, for our needs, and for the rest of the community.

blog.description: Everyone is invited to contribute, be it to document, translate, correct problems or extend functionality !

list.title: Get quick access to the latest headlines
list.description:
Our application is easy to use: access all article categories with a tap. Banners reinforce the content and allow you to know the content of the article without even reading the title.

We have optimized the performance of the application for a fast loading and a fluid use. Essential content is cached so that it can be efficiently retrieved for a next use.

article.title: Read comfortably our articles
article.description:
The presentation of the articles is clear and goes to the essentials: no annoying popups, no social network buttons... Focus on the reading of your article in a page only optimized for that.
In fact, our articles are written with love to offer you the best content <3

theme.title: In light... as in dark
theme.description:
Do you like sunny summer days? We have a clear theme. Do you prefer dark caves? We also have a dark theme. Choose the look you like from our two beautiful themes, and read your articles comfortably.

If you wish, the theme can be adapted to your system. No more independent tweaks in each application in order not to destroy your eyes at the opening.

privacy.title: No ads. No tracking. It's as simple as that.
privacy.description:
Being ourselves users of numerous reading applications on our phones, we wanted to reproduce their advantages without bearing their disadvantages. That's why no advertising is displayed across the app. Moreover, we don't collect any data, not even in an anonymous way. Statistics is far from being our area of expertise, believe us.

Do you want to check it out by yourself? No problem, the application is distributed in open-source under GNU GPL v3 license. Also, don't hesitate to contribute to its development!

download.title: Ready to use our application?
download.description: Download it on your phone now!

pwa.title: Installing an application doesn't suit you?
pwa.description: Don't panic. Thanks to our progressive web application (PWA) directly installed on becauseofprog.fr, you can add the site to your home screen for an easy access to all the articles. However, you won't benefit from future features, such as notifications when new content is published.

chrome.title: On Chrome (or any Chrome-based browser)
chrome.content:
If you are on mobile / tablet : Go to the 3 small dots at the top right of the screen and touch "Add to Home screen".

If you are on PC : Go to the 3 small dots at the top right of the screen, go to "More tools" and click "Add to desktop". Don't forget to check the box "Open in window".
You can also find it in the chrome://apps page

android.title: On the Android 4.2+ browser
android.content: This browser doesn't support web applications!

firefox.title: On Firefox
firefox.content: This browser doesn't support the most recent features, prefer using a Chrome-based browser or Opera. Press and hold down the URL and click "Add to home screen".

opera.title: On Opera
opera.content: Go to the 3 small dots at the top right of the screen and touch "Home screen" at the very bottom.

opera_mini.title: On Opera Mini
opera_mini.content: This browser does not support web applications. However, you can get the full version of Opera (instructions just above).

safari.title: On iOS (with Safari)
safari.content: Press the middle button at the bottom of the screen, and tap "Add to Home screen".
